Package org.forgerock.openig.handler

Handles HTTP exchange requests by generating responses.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Handler Handles an HTTP exchange request by producing an associated response.
 

Class Summary
ClientHandler Submits exchange requests to remote servers.
ClientHandler.Heaplet Creates and initializes a client handler in a heap environment.
DispatchHandler Dispatches to one of a list of handlers.
DispatchHandler.Binding Binds an expression with a handler to dispatch to.
DispatchHandler.Heaplet Creates and initializes a dispatch handler in a heap environment.
GenericHandler A generic base class for handlers with handy injected heap objects.
SequenceHandler Processes an exchange through a sequence of handlers.
SequenceHandler.Binding Binds sequenced handlers with sequence processing postconditions.
SequenceHandler.Heaplet Creates and initializes a sequence handler in a heap environment.
StaticResponseHandler Creates a static response in an HTTP exchange.
StaticResponseHandler.Heaplet Creates and initializes a static response handler in a heap environment.
 

Exception Summary
HandlerException An exception that is thrown during handler operations.
 

Package org.forgerock.openig.handler Description

Handles HTTP exchange requests by generating responses.
